statement.name: INSERT_SMANMK
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMANMK (NRONMK, NRONMA, NROKRG, STDNMK, TPONMK, SQLBKR) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAKRG
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAKRG SET NOMKRG=?, STDKRG=?, TELKRG=?, NROCIU=?, DIRKRG=?, NVLKRG=?, SKLKRG=?, GRDKRG=?, BASKRG=?, VLHKRG=?, SQLBKR=? WHERE NROKRG=?

statement.name: DELETE_SMANMK
statement.sql: DELETE FROM SMANMK WHERE NRONMA =? AND NROKRG NOT IN ( ? )
